channel.title: Some Server Help
channel.description: Hello i am making a server its a 317 and theres two things i need help on 1. how do i stop pking farming...? 2. how do i fix duel arena when you kill someone they leave the arena but you dont so your stuck inside but if you logout it says you forfitted so you loose the stake. i need that fixed A.S.A.P Before i release it! ill REP if it helps me please respond!

item.title: Some Server Help
item.dc:creator: @UnLeAsH_ThE_BeAsT UnLeAsH_ThE_BeAsT
item.description:
@UnLeAsH_ThE_BeAsT wrote:

oh thought there was a rep system lolololol my bad. and i actually added the duel arena myself but i dont know what i did wrong it all works fully but the reward part, pk farming i almost fixed i got it to send a message saying no pk farmign when you kill someone else with the same ip that bout far as i got with that, any suggestions or people i can messag eon skype or even here just feel free to post below that would be great!

Read full topic

item.title: Some Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

Well, first you can’t rep. And second have you tried fixing on your own?

Read full topic
